t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hello again, Reimu. Did you think the spell could be turned off?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It hasn't. I still need my hair fixed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You thought the people visiting the Hakurei Shrine say you look better with your new hair. I think so too.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That wasn't the case. I still look awful. Listen to me. I demand your mother end this hair madness.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Does she look as bad as I am? I think you're the same.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Have you not looked at contemporary fashion trends? I'm not going to forget this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I think I'll be swearing revenge for what you did to my mother earlier!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I can't wait to see her...
